title: See correct MLS on Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged with permission to access Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_expected: THEN "MLS" column should display player's current MLS as of the time of utility being loaded

title: Payroll Forecast Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN accessing and updating the Payroll Forecast Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user
custom_steps:
WHEN a user (LRD - Contracts - Admin role group, by default) with this permission set logs in 
AND user navigates to Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Payroll Forecast tab should appear on the Major Contracts Dashboard
AND user should be able to access and update Payroll Forecast Utility 
BUT users without this permission should not be able to see "Payroll Forecast" tab
AND users without this permission should not be able to view the utility anywhere in the system

title: LRD can delete a cash transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Forecast utility in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a trash can icon for only manually added Cash Transactions being displayed
AND clicking the trash can should remove the associated Cash Transaction from the screen
AND user should be required to click "Save" in order for this to change to be saved
AND there should be no way to recover removed Cash Transactions

title: LRD can delete a cash transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Report Utility in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a trash can icon for each of the Cash Transactions being displayed
AND clicking the trash can should remove the associated Cash Transaction from the screen
AND user should be required to click "Save" in order for this to change to be saved
AND there should be no way to recover removed Cash Transactions

title: Payroll Report Utilities Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN accessing and updating the Payroll Report Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user
custom_steps:
WHEN a user (LRD - Contracts - Admin role group, by default) with this permission set logs in 
AND user navigates to Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Payroll Reports" tab should appear on the Major Contracts Dashboard
AND user should be able to access and update Payroll Report Utility 
BUT users without this permission should not be able to see "Payroll Reports" tab
AND users without this permission should not be able to view the utility anywhere in the system

title: Receive error if signing player that has pending suspensions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to create a Major Contract for a Professional Player 
AND selected player has an Approved Pending Suspension transaction (Do not include Reversed)
custom_steps: WHEN user updates contract status (On Submit rules are checked)
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "This player has a pending suspension."
AND error should be overrideable by both the Club and LRD

title: Receive error if signing player that already has roster status of Coach or Manage
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to create a Major Contract for a Professional Player 
AND selected player's current or pending MJ Roster Status is Coach or Manager
custom_steps: WHEN user updates contract status (On Submit rules are checked)
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "This player has an approved employee contract and is not eligible to sign a major league contract"
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the point of entry

title: Update deferred comp calculations to reflect new interpretation of rules
custom_preconds: GIVEN rules have been reinterpreted around Deferred Compensation that is payable outside guaranteed years
custom_steps: WHEN user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_expected:
THEN utility should be updated to reflect this new rule so that option years are no longer considered guaranteed for the purposes of deferred comp
AND this change should be effective dated (as of July 2016)
